message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product! I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay $85 for it.

Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest. While $85 is tempting, I'm looking for a little closer to my original asking price.  Would you be willing to pay $95 for the product? I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.
Hi Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to go up to $90 for the product.
